title: #1500 It's All In Your Actions
itunes:title: #1500 It's All In Your Actions
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show with Drew recounting a recent trip he took to Illinois to speak to a conference of urologists and some of the behavior he experienced in the very blue city of Chicago. Drew also expresses his growing frustrations with the CDC and specifically director Rochelle Walensky's recent misleading comments on the efficacy of masks in the interest of the greater good.  The guys then turn to the phones and speak with a caller who wants their thoughts on the minimum wage, leading to a much larger conversation on that topic and economics generally. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
BlindsGalore.com, tell them we sent you
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
